title: Buying Into A Down Market
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Ted Waller joins us again to discuss staying bullish but getting more realistic about the cannabis industry. Limited growth rates, margin compression and the need to keep our emotions out of investing. Buying special situations and what stocks are more concerning.
content:encoded: Ted Waller joins us again to discuss staying bullish but getting more realistic about the cannabis industry. Limited growth rates, margin compression and the need to keep our emotions out of investing. Buying special situations and what stocks are more concerning.
